title: Upali Dharmadasa holds the key to Sri Lanka’s claim for UDRS authorship
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – In life just as there are challenges there are opportunities to undo injustices so that truth wins the day. The present situation revolves around a song, the singer and the composer. The song is the player referral rule we know as the Umpire Decision Review System (UDRS), the singer…
